game.title: The Golden Quest for Blackbeard's Treasure
game.objective: Uncover the treasure of Blackbeard at his hidden island.
game.description: Track down the notorious pirate and claim his wealth for yourself. Success awaits those brave enough to embark on this adventure.
game.reward: A chest brimming with precious artifacts and rare coins.

task.description: Board the legendary vessel at the harbor of Port Royal.
task.location: Port Royal Harbor, Blackbeard's Legacy ship

task.objective: Seek the hidden chamber in the captain's cabin
task.description: Search for a secret compartment within the ship's quarters.

task.objective: Follow the clues from the chamber to the treasure map
task.description: The map will lead you to a map of the island's treasure location.

task.objective: Explore and find the treasure at the marked spot
task.description: Once you locate the coordinates on the island, venture to the specified spot.
